mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id id, t1.merchant_code merchantCode, t1.merchant_name merchantName, t1.merchant_province merchantProvince, t1.merchant_city merchantCity, t1.merchant_address merchantAddress, t1.merchant_return_address merchantReturnAddress, t1.merchant_return_name merchantReturnName, t1.merchant_return_phone merchantReturnPhone, t1.merchant_return_Postcode merchantReturnPostCode, t1.merchant_Postcode merchantPostcode, t1.merchant_type merchantType, t1.merchant_settlement_date merchantSettlementDate, t1.settlement_bank_name settlementBankName, t1.settlement_card_no settlementCardNo, t1.manage_type manageType, t1.org_code orgCode, t2.STATUS STATUS, t1.create_user createUser, t1.create_date createDate, t1.update_user updateUser, t1.update_date updateDate, t1.merchant_nickname merchantNickname, t1.merchant_settlement_freight merchantSettlementFreight, t1.remark remark, t1.is_contain_freight isContainFreight FROM t_esp_merchant_info t1 LEFT JOIN t_esp_merchant_temp_info t2 ON t1.merchant_code = t2.merchant_code
ORDER BY t1.update_date DESC

SELECT t1.id id, t1.merchant_code merchantCode, t1.merchant_name merchantName, t1.merchant_province merchantProvince, t1.merchant_city merchantCity, t1.merchant_address merchantAddress, t1.merchant_return_address merchantReturnAddress, t1.merchant_return_name merchantReturnName, t1.merchant_return_phone merchantReturnPhone, t1.merchant_return_Postcode merchantReturnPostCode, t1.merchant_Postcode merchantPostcode, t1.merchant_type merchantType, t1.merchant_settlement_date merchantSettlementDate, t1.settlement_bank_name settlementBankName, t1.settlement_card_no settlementCardNo, t1.manage_type manageType, t1.org_code orgCode, t1.status status, t1.create_user createUser, t1.create_date createDate, t1.update_user updateUser, t1.update_date updateDate, t1.merchant_nickname merchantNickname, t1.merchant_settlement_freight merchantSettlementFreight, t1.remark remark, t1.is_contain_freight isContainFreight FROM t_esp_merchant_temp_info t1
ORDER BY t1.update_date DESC

SELECT t1.id id, t1.merchant_code merchantCode, t1.merchant_name merchantName, t1.merchant_province merchantProvince, t1.merchant_city merchantCity, t1.merchant_address merchantAddress, t1.merchant_return_address merchantReturnAddress, t1.merchant_return_name merchantReturnName, t1.merchant_return_phone merchantReturnPhone, t1.merchant_return_Postcode merchantReturnPostCode, t1.merchant_Postcode merchantPostcode, t1.merchant_type merchantType, t1.merchant_settlement_date merchantSettlementDate, t1.settlement_bank_name settlementBankName, t1.settlement_card_no settlementCardNo, t1.manage_type manageType, t1.org_code orgCode, t1.status status, t1.create_user createUser, t1.create_date createDate, t1.update_user updateUser, t1.update_date updateDate, t1.merchant_nickname merchantNickname, t1.merchant_settlement_freight merchantSettlementFreight, t1.remark remark, t1.is_contain_freight isContainFreight FROM t_esp_merchant_info t1
ORDER BY t1.update_date DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_esp_merchant_info ( merchant_code, merchant_name, merchant_province, merchant_city, merchant_address, merchant_return_address, merchant_return_name , merchant_return_phone , merchant_return_Postcode, merchant_Postcode, merchant_type, merchant_nickname, merchant_settlement_freight, merchant_settlement_date, settlement_bank_name, settlement_card_no, manage_type, org_code, status, create_user, update_user, remark, is_contain_freight, create_date, update_date
) VALUES ( #{merchantCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantProvince, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantCity, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantReturnAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantReturnName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantReturnPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantReturnPostCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantPostcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantNickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantSettlementFreight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merchantSettlementDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{settlementBankName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementCardNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isContainFreight, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

INSERT INTO t_esp_merchant_temp_info ( merchant_code, merchant_name, merchant_province, merchant_city, merchant_address, merchant_return_address, merchant_return_name, merchant_return_phone, merchant_return_Postcode, merchant_Postcode, merchant_type, merchant_nickname, merchant_settlement_freight, merchant_settlement_date, settlement_bank_name, settlement_card_no, manage_type, org_code, status, create_user, update_user, remark, is_contain_freight, create_date, update_date
) VALUES ( #{merchantCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantProvince, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantCity, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantReturnAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantReturnName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantReturnPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantReturnPostCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantPostcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantNickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantSettlementFreight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merchantSettlementDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{settlementBankName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementCardNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isContainFreight, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_ESP_MERCHANT_INFO
update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE merchant_code = #{merchantCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE t_esp_merchant_temp_info
update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE merchant_code = #{merchantCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT id id, merchant_code merchantCode, merchant_name merchantName, merchant_province merchantProvince, merchant_city merchantCity, merchant_address merchantAddress, merchant_return_address merchantReturnAddress, merchant_return_name merchantReturnName, merchant_return_phone merchantReturnPhone, merchant_return_Postcode merchantReturnPostCode, merchant_Postcode merchantPostcode, merchant_type merchantType, merchant_settlement_date merchantSettlementDate, settlement_bank_name settlementBankName, settlement_card_no settlementCardNo, manage_type manageType, org_code orgCode, status status, create_user createUser, create_date createDate, update_user updateUser, update_date updateDate, merchant_nickname merchantNickname, merchant_settlement_freight merchantSettlementFreight, remark remark, is_contain_freight isContainFreight FROM t_esp_merchant_info

SELECT id id, merchant_code merchantCode, merchant_name merchantName, merchant_province merchantProvince, merchant_city merchantCity, merchant_address merchantAddress, merchant_return_address merchantReturnAddress, merchant_return_name merchantReturnName, merchant_return_phone merchantReturnPhone, merchant_return_Postcode merchantReturnPostCode, merchant_Postcode merchantPostcode, merchant_type merchantType, merchant_settlement_date merchantSettlementDate, settlement_bank_name settlementBankName, settlement_card_no settlementCardNo, manage_type manageType, org_code orgCode, status status, create_user createUser, create_date createDate, update_user updateUser, update_date updateDate, merchant_nickname merchantNickname, merchant_settlement_freight merchantSettlementFreight, remark remark, is_contain_freight isContainFreight FROM t_esp_merchant_info

SELECT id id, merchant_code merchantCode, merchant_name merchantName, merchant_province merchantProvince, merchant_city merchantCity, merchant_address merchantAddress, merchant_return_address merchantReturnAddress, merchant_return_name merchantReturnName, merchant_return_phone merchantReturnPhone, merchant_return_Postcode merchantReturnPostCode, merchant_Postcode merchantPostcode, merchant_type merchantType, merchant_settlement_date merchantSettlementDate, settlement_bank_name settlementBankName, settlement_card_no settlementCardNo, manage_type manageType, org_code orgCode, status status, create_user createUser, create_date createDate, update_user updateUser, update_date updateDate, remark remark, is_contain_freight isContainFreight FROM t_esp_merchant_info WHERE status = '1'
